place.name: STANTON PRIOR
place.gazetteerText: STANTON-PRIOR, a parish in Keynsham district, Somerset; at Stantonbury Hill, 3 miles S of Saltford r. station, and 5 WSW of Bath. Post town, Bristol. Acres, 841. Real property, £2,629. Pop., 136. Houses, 32. The manor belonged anciently to Bath priory. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Bath and Wells. Value, £182.* Patron, W. G. Langton, Esq. The church is old but good. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
